Comment: The sad part is that the victim's father came in as a silent observer and had forgiven his son's killer shortly before this case went national. Now he's kicked out purely for being there? I can be understanding if he was causing a visible, audible disturbance at the presser, but he wasn't.
Author: charmaide

Comment: And the father did what any good person would do. Once asked to Leave, do so without stabbing anyone.
Author: Iamstillhere44

Comment: Yet another reprehensible criminal that Liberals hold up as an icon.   Well played
Author: Flare4roach
